001.name: City of Lamarr - Lone Wolf Tavern
001.description:
The best tavern in town, also the only tavern in town..
You recognize andre, an old man who used to be an adventurer just like you. He's sitting at a table all by himself.
There's also the barman who's talking to another character that hasn't been implemented yet..

andre.name: Andre
msg: Hey there, adventurer, how ya doin' ?
I used to be an adventurer just like you, but then I took an arrow in the knee..

barman.name: Barman
msg: Howdy, tis' a fine day for a whiskey, wouldn't you say ?
Whiskey, rhum, our finest pint of ale, what say you ?

002.name: City of Lamarr - Town Square
002.description: There's a troup of bards playing music in a corner of the street, the merchants are getting their stands prepped up for the day ahead, childrens are playing together and birds are cawing.

bards.name: Bards
msg: ♪ Even if you're lost, you can't lose the love because it's in your heart ♪
♪ Toss a coin to your whore, oh, breast they are plenty, oh oh oh.. ♪

003.name: City of Lamarr - Church
003.description: Otravia, the realm of the king..
